title: Factor
text: In this equation $${ax}^2+bx+c$$ the square root of a is $$5$$
speech: In this equation ; a x squared, plus b x plus c  the square root of a is  5;

title: Factor Pt2.
text: In the form $$\left(px+o\right) \left(mx+n\right)$$. To solve for o and $$n$$, they must multiply to the constant in the original equation and $$pn+om$$ is equal to $$b$$ in $${ax}^2+bx+c$$.
speech: In the form ; open paren, p x plus o, close paren; times, open paren, m x plus n, close paren; . To solve for o and  n , they must multiply to the constant in the original equation and  p n; plus, o m  is equal to  b  in  a x squared; plus b x plus c; .

title: Solve
text: What are the values of o and $$n$$? (Give answer with coma inbetween with the larger number first Ex. 4,2)
speech: What are the values of o and  n; ? (Give answer with coma inbetween with the larger number first Ex. 4,2)

title: Plug in
text: Plug in the calculated values into the simplified form
speech: Plug in the calculated values into the simplified form
